sqlQuery.name: AlignmentInfo
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT etn.source_id as sequence_id, a.source_id as id, a.length, blat.target_start, blat.target_end, blat.target_start - 10000 as context_start, blat.target_end + 10000 as context_end, decode(blat.is_consistent,0,'No',1,'Yes',blat.is_consistent) as is_consistent, decode(blat.is_reversed,0,'+',1,'-',blat.is_reversed) as is_reversed, blat.percent_identity, blat.score || '' score, (SELECT DISTINCT CASE WHEN taxn.name like 'Giardia lamblia%' or taxn.name like 'Giardia intestinalis%' THEN 'Giardia lamblia' WHEN taxn.name like 'Cryptosporidium parvum%' THEN 'Cryptosporidium parvum' WHEN taxn.name like 'Cryptosporidium hominis%'THEN 'Cryptosporidium hominis' WHEN taxn.name like 'Toxoplasma%' THEN 'Toxoplasma gondii' END as organism FROM sres.taxonname taxn WHERE etn.taxon_id = taxn.taxon_id) organism, a.number_of_contained_sequences as count FROM &&alignment_location&& blat, dots.Assembly a, dots.NASequence etn WHERE blat.query_na_sequence_id = a.na_sequence_id AND blat.target_na_sequence_id = etn.na_sequence_id &&extdbrid&& AND (blat.target_end - blat.target_start ) < 5000 AND blat.is_best_alignment = 1 AND a.source_id = $$primaryKey$$ &&sequence_level&& ORDER BY blat.is_best_alignment desc, blat.percent_identity desc

sqlQuery.name: LibraryInfo
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT l.dbest_name as library, count(e.est_id) as est_count FROM dots.est e, dots.library l, dots.assemblysequence aseq, dots.assembly asmbly WHERE asmbly.source_id = $$primaryKey$$ AND asmbly.na_sequence_id = aseq.assembly_na_sequence_id AND aseq.na_sequence_id = e.na_sequence_id AND e.library_id = l.library_id GROUP BY l.dbest_name ORDER BY est_count desc

sqlQuery.name: EstInfo
sqlQuery.sql: select att.source_id as est, length(aseq.gapped_sequence) as gapped_length,aseq.assembly_offset + 1 as "start", aseq.assembly_offset + length(aseq.gapped_sequence) as "end", decode(assembly_strand,1,'+','-') as assembly_strand, library_dbest_name as library from apidb.ESTATTRIBUTES att, dots.ASSEMBLYSEQUENCE aseq,dots.EXTERNALNASEQUENCE enas where att.assembly_source_id = $$primaryKey$$ and aseq.na_sequence_id = enas.na_sequence_id and enas.source_id = att.source_id order by aseq.assembly_offset
